comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of bowls of goat curry and y be the number of bowls of chicken curry.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "3x + 5y \leq 1500 (Goat meat constraint)",
        "6x + 5y \leq 2000 (Chicken meat constraint)",
        "y \geq 0.25(x+y) (At least 25% of bowls made must be chicken curry)",
        "x \geq y (Number of goat curry bowls must be larger than chicken curry bowls)",
        "x, y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint)"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 6x + 5y (Total amount of curry base used)"
}
